pages.text: Press [w] to Ponder. $(br2)This is the main method of (when paired with a Fluid Pipe and some Mechanical Pumps) extracting, pumping in, or transporting fluids on contraptions and trains.

$(li)Running multiple Mechanical Pumps adjacent together and connected together as shown previously in the Ponder scene for Mechanical Pumps significantly increases the fluid throughput. $(li)High RPM also works.
